LanguageData.BuildEmpGrenades.label: 制造 EMP 手雷
LanguageData.BuildEmpGrenades.description: Builds a set of EMP Grenades. Electro-Magnetic Pulse Grenades are extremely damaging to electronic equipment. These grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3 tile radius from the point of impact.
LanguageData.MakeMolotov.label: 制造 燃烧瓶
LanguageData.MakeMolotov.description: 制造 a thrown weapon that burns your enemies into ashes!
LanguageData.MakeIncendiaryGrenade.label: 制造 燃烧手雷
LanguageData.MakeIncendiaryGrenade.description: A condensed mix of plasma materials 制造 for a small but chaos inducing explosion.
LanguageData.BuildFragGrenades.label: 制造 破片手雷
LanguageData.BuildFlashbangGrenades.label: 制造 闪光手雷
LanguageData.BuildFlashbangGrenades.description: Builds a set of Shock Grenades. Shock grenades are damaging to electronic equipment or electronic-based entities. They do not harm non-electronic entities. Shock Grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3x3 blast zone around the point of impact.
LanguageData.BuildFusionGrenades.label: 制造 融合手雷
LanguageData.BuildFusionGrenades.description: An improvement over the simple frag grenade, contains a more potent explosive. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaGrenades.label: 制造 等离子手雷
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaGrenades.description: A very potent mix of plasma particles 制造 for a small but deadly explosion. \n\n产出：1.
